docs.snippet: While San Antonio Spurs steamrolled toward their fourth 60-win season in 11 years, coach Gregg Popovich was asked if there is a secret formula for the franchise's almost unfathomable run of excellence....
docs.lead_paragraph: While San Antonio Spurs steamrolled toward their fourth 60-win season in 11 years, coach Gregg Popovich was asked if there is a secret formula for the franchise's almost unfathomable run of excellence.

docs.snippet: If the Miami Heat are going to watch their season and reign atop the NBA end at the hands of the Charlotte Bobcats, then fates of the franchises will have to change in a hurry....

docs.snippet: Forest City Ratner, the developer of Atlantic Yards, plans to bring in a new partner and accelerate construction of its first residential building....
docs.lead_paragraph: Forest City Ratner, the developer of Atlantic Yards, plans to bring in a new partner and accelerate construction of its first residential building.
docs.abstract: Forest City Ratner, developer of Atlantic Yards, plans to bring in new partner Greenland Holding Group and accelerate construction of its first residential building on the 22-acre site, which will offer three additional buildings and over 900 apartments; after many delays, residential component of Atlantic Yards project has an estimated completion date of late 2015.
